name: Song of Morus: Skypatch
description:
It's a small 3-axis bullet-hell shooting game with a story focus on a young toaist priestess. It only has 3 stages for the game jam , but it's created for expanding in the future.

☯ Story 遊戲故事 ☯

One day, Song a mysteric package of a powerful anicent relic. And things just get escalated.

☯ Control 遊戲控制 ☯

left click - shoot
right hold- aim
WASD - move
space - jump (quintuple jumps)
shift - roll (counted as jump)
Q - urgent shield (limited)
